bio: As a software engineer with a passion for solving challenging problems and producing high-quality code, I am eager to make a difference in the industry. With a diploma in Information Technology from Singapore Polytechnic, where I specialized in Solution Development, Data Structure Algorithm, and User Interface Design (UI/UX), I have the necessary skills and knowledge to contribute to the coding world. Currently, I am a lead software engineer at Pixium Digital, Singapore, where I work with the Elixir Phoenix team and continuously strive to improve my skills. I am dedicated to delivering innovative and sustainable solutions and look forward to contributing to the growth and success of my future employer.

list: Champion of Clementi Community Centre 2018, Singapore.

Champion of Cypher Beatbox Battle 2019, Singapore.

Vice Champion of A Cappella Beatbox Championship 2021, Singapore.
Champion of A Cappella Beatbox Battle 2019, Singapore.
